韣字的基本解释

韣
dú
弓袋：“带以弓韣。”
束缚。

韣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dú］
［《廣韻》徒谷切，入屋，定。］
［《廣韻》之欲切，入燭，章。］
［《廣韻》市玉切，入燭，禪。］
(1)弓袋。
(2)指弧、席等物的套子。
(3)通“櫝”。木柜，木匣。

韣字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【韋字部】　韣； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1395第23
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】徒谷切【正韻】杜谷切，?音讀。【玉篇】弓衣也。韜也。【禮·月令】帶以弓䪅。【少儀】弓則以左手屈韣執拊。【儀禮·覲禮】乗墨車，載龍旂弧䪅。【註】弓衣曰䪅。又【禮·明堂位】載弧韣。【註】弧，旌旗。其衣曰韣。　又【唐韻】之欲切【集韻】朱欲切，?音燭。又【廣韻】尺玉切【集韻】樞玉切，?音觸。又【廣韻】市玉切【集韻】【韻會】殊玉切，?音蜀。義?同。　【集韻】或作䪅。

韣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
韣字的起名意思

暂无。

bow case
Basic explanation of words
bow case
du
Bow bag: "Bring a bow."
Bondage.
bow case
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dú］
["Guangyun" Tuguqie, enter the house, set. ]
[The desire to cut in "Guang Yun", into the candle, chapter. ]
["Guangyun" City jade cut, candle, Zen. ]
(1) Bow bag.
(2) Refers to sleeves for arcs, mats, etc.
(3) Through "椟". Wooden cabinets, wooden boxes.
bow case
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji] [Wei Zi Department] 　韣; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1395 Page 23
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Tu Gu Qi [Zheng Yun] Du Gu Qi, pronunciation. [Jade articles] Bow clothes also. Tao also. 【Rite·Yueling】Take a bow. [Shao Yi] The bow is squeezed with the left hand. [Rituals·Greetings] Ride in the ink car and carry the dragon flag in the arc. [Note] Gong Yi said: Also 【Rite·Mingtang Position】Carry the arc. [Note] Arc, banner. His clothes are called Yun.　 [Tang Yun] The desire to cut [Ji Yun] Zhu desire to cut,? Yin candle. Also [Guangyun] Ruler Jade Cut [Jiyun] Shu Yu cut,? Sound touch. Also [Guangyun] City Jade Cut [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Special Jade Cut, Sound Shu. Righteous? Same.　【Jiyun】Or as a couple.

чехол, футляр
弓韣 чехол на лук
